definitions: The action of dividing, separating, or removing a part of something with a sharp instrument.
The action of reducing the amount or quantity of something.
The action of making an incision or wound.
The action of stopping or interrupting something.
examples: She is cutting the fabric for the dress.
The company is cutting costs to improve profits.
He was cutting his finger while chopping vegetables.
They are cutting the power to the building.
